content.text: Calculate the volume of stone A

Describe the difference between a renewable energy source and a non-renewable source
Name one renewable energy source
Suggest one reason why your choice in **(b)**(i) is not, so far, widely used for generating electricity

Electricity can be generated from either renewable or non-renewable energy sources

Sound travels at \(330 \text{m / s}\) in air

what is heard
when
Fig. 5.1 shows a boat steaming along a river. The river is in a wide gorge and there are high cliffs on each side
The boat sounds its hooter once. Two clear echoes are heard by a person on the boat
The first echo is 1.5s after the hooter sounds. The second echo is 2.5s after the hooter sounds
